nodes.description: 2020年2月14日，巴基斯坦基于组织 Jaish-e-Mohammad 的自杀袭击在印控克什米尔造成至少40名印军死亡
nodes.support_text: The suicide attack which has been claimed by Pakistan-based terrorist group Jaish-e-Mohammad

nodes.description: 2月12日黎明，印度空军Mirage 2000战机首次突破停火协议，深入巴基斯坦开伯尔普赫图克瓦省巴拉克特地区执行空袭
nodes.support_text: Indian Air Force (IAF) Mirage 2000 fighter aircraft crossed deep into Pakistan on Tuesday morning

nodes.description: 印度指控空袭摧毁巴方在巴拉克特地区的武装分子营地，巴方否认并称袭击目标为空地
nodes.support_text: India says that the air strikes targeted a militant camp near Balakot... Pakistan has disputed this claim, saying the strikes hit an empty area

nodes.description: 巴方最初宣称仅遭少量印军战机入侵后撤，随后改口称空袭未造成实际损害
nodes.support_text: Pakistan first stated that this was a limited incursion by a few Indian air force fighters... The Pakistani army's public relations chief then switched tack

nodes.description: 印度确认巴拉克特实际位于巴控领土且距印控区仅5-6公里，驳斥巴方地理混淆说
nodes.support_text: India confirmed that the actual location of Balakot was in Pakistani-administered territory

nodes.description: 巴方威胁向联合国申诉，但维持有限否认姿态以减轻后续报复压力
nodes.support_text: Pakistan has warned of retaliation and threatened to take the issue to the United Nations

nodes.description: 印度宣布已达成军事目标，同时将军队置于高度戒备状态
nodes.support_text: India has indicated that it has achieved its aims... The Indian military has been placed on alert

nodes.description: 巴方通过双重巴拉克特地名混淆策略，为后续军事回应保留解释空间
nodes.support_text: There are two towns by the name of Balakot... This obfuscation is made possible by the fact that there are two towns by the name of Balakot

nodes.description: 印度政府声明空袭具有震慑效果，但避免明确宣战
nodes.support_text: India government declared the air strikes had a deterrent effect but avoided explicit war declaration

nodes.description: 巴方持续否认深度渗透指控，同时通过舆论战降低军事回应必要性
nodes.support_text: Pakistan has continued to deny the deep incursion allegations while using public relations to reduce the necessity of military response

nodes.description: 基于动词'arose'的事件描述：2011年美军未经许可进入巴基斯坦引发的担忧产生
nodes.support_text: 此事件应加强外界对2011年美军未经许可进入巴基斯坦的担忧
